title: problems patching in new client
body: please help me when i launch the new client it tries to patch but it says lol something is up with our servers and its preventing you from patching error code 003 then it gives me an option to restart patching then it says the exact same error again i never reached past 0

replies.body:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-MtAozTH2bI&feature=youtu.be
Ez fix! :D
repair failed. what now ?
Same here.
same
same

> [{quoted}](name=Ghuolo,realm=EUNE,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=LFW0vdyU,comment-id=00090000000000000000,timestamp=2017-08-23T18:27:53.687+0000)
>
> same

Rads->projects->lol_game_client ->releases
Delete everything in that file and then start game. it will take some time (about 30min for me because my gf is streaming movies -.-)
should work fine
What is the RADS folder??? is this just in the data roaming (%appdata%)???

I found it, I just deleted the files, and im trying it out right now.
right click your shortcut to the game, go to properties and there you see where the game is located. 
not sure if this explains it for you. let me know.

mate did you try the solution i posted about 2 hours ago on this thread? just go to your installation folder into RADS->project->lol_game_client->releases and delete everything in that. then start the game as admin (or normaly really) and you should patch fine. If all the people that found the solution helpful upvoted that post to get it a bit higher it would help :)

> [{quoted}](name=MrSwagganton,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=LFW0vdyU,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-01-18T14:37:46.140+0000)

> please help me when i launch the new client it tries to patch but it says lol something is up with our servers and its preventing you from patching error code 003 then it gives me an option to restart patching then it says the exact same error again i never reached past 0

I have the same problem can anyone dafuq help me??!?!?!??

if someone is having problems with patch 7.17 just do this 
i fixed it go to the folder where your game is installed then go to rads projects lol_game_client and delete releases it will delete the last patch and you will have to download the last patch again it fixed it for me trust me !!
Worked for me. Thanks.

C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\solutions\league_client_sln\releases
Had the same problem, just delete files in the folder above and it will patch normally after you run league again
Doesnt work
please help error 003{{champion:2}} {{item:3073}}
anyone found away to solve this .....

> [{quoted}](name=x  Savage   x,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=LFW0vdyU,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2017-08-23T08:15:26.769+0000)
>
> anyone found away to solve this .....

Yes, you go to your lol installation file (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_game_client\releases) for me
and delete everything in that file. then start the game (as admin preferably)

> [{quoted}](name=Saezio,realm=EUNE,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=LFW0vdyU,comment-id=00050001,timestamp=2017-08-23T18:22:17.388+0000)
>
> Yes, you go to your lol installation file (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_game_client\releases) for me
> and delete everything in that file. then start the game (as admin preferably)

not the whole installation file just the releases file.( just to be sure you wont be deleting the whole riot games file.)
